attributes.action: Abandon plans to create a new customs union with the european union.
attributes.additional_details:
This petition has the intent of clarifying the reason i signed the previous position, calling into question the response of government and garnering support for my position.

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/213782

As seems to be common with Mrs May's government there's always a semantic element to the response. I'd like to clarify that this petition  calls for NO trade deal and NO customs union with the European Union and i would like the government to take this call into account.
attributes.background: Having recently seen the petition to 'ensure that the U.K. leaves the EU single market & customs union.' I can't help but think that the Government is playing semantic games in it's response so I would like to reiterate a position.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because, as you say, there’s already a petition about this issue. 

You might like to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/220073
